label: Guitar
description: Musical instrument with six strings.

label: Piano
description: Keyboard instrument with black and white keys.

label: Drums
description: Percussion instrument played with sticks or hands.

label: Violin
description: Four-stringed bowed instrument.

label: Saxophone
description: Woodwind instrument with a reed mouthpiece.

label: Trumpet
description: Brass instrument played by buzzing the lips.

label: Flute
description: Woodwind instrument played by blowing across a hole.

label: Bass Guitar
description: Electric or acoustic guitar with lower pitch range.

label: Cello
description: Large string instrument played with a bow.

label: Clarinet
description: Woodwind instrument with a single reed mouthpiece.

label: Ukulele
description: Small guitar-like instrument with four strings.

label: Harmonica
description: Small wind instrument played by mouth.

label: Xylophone
description: Percussion instrument with tuned wooden bars.

label: Banjo
description: String instrument with a round body and a long neck.

label: Tambourine
description: Hand-held percussion instrument with jingling metal discs.

label: Accordion
description: Portable instrument with bellows and a keyboard.

label: Maracas
description: Pair of handheld percussion instruments.

label: Harp
description: Large string instrument played by plucking.

label: Synthesizer
description: Electronic musical instrument that produces various sounds.

label: Bagpipes
description: Wind instrument with multiple pipes and a bag for air.
